ComicInfo.Summary: Gives detailed information on the Youngblood Headquarters, The Youngblood Mobile Command Center, The Hypersonic Transport, The Helicopter Drop Ship and Chapel's Hyper Cycle. It also highlights weaponry such as Shaft's bow, Chapel's weapons, Vogue's weapons, Sentinel's armor, Diehard's equipment and Combat's weapons and armor.
